title: Locate
text: Locate the given place value and mark it or highlight it.
speech: Locate the given place value and mark it or highlight it.
pacedSpeech: Locate the given place value and mark it or highlight it.

title: Digits to the Right
text: Underline the value to the right of the highlighted or marked value.
speech: Underline the value to the right of the highlighted or marked value.
pacedSpeech: Underline the value to the right of the highlighted or marked value.

title: Value
text: Is this value greater than or equal to 5?
speech: Is this value greater than or equal to 5?
pacedSpeech: Is this value greater than or equal to 5?

title: Add
text: If the underlined digit is greater than or equal to $$5$$, we will need to add one to the digit in the given place value.
speech: If the underlined digit is greater than or equal to  5 , we will need to add one to the digit in the given place value.
pacedSpeech: If the underlined digit is greater than or equal to   5
, we will need to add one to the digit in the given place value.

title: Remove
text: Rewrite the number, removing all digits to the right of the rounding digit.
speech: Rewrite the number, removing all digits to the right of the rounding digit.
pacedSpeech: Rewrite the number, removing all digits to the right of the rounding digit.
